data.message: I stand with Em. Fuck the rest of you dipshits. How anybody can respect trump is beyond me. The guy is an ass backwards example of a human being and so are his supporters....

replies.message: Half the shit that spews out his mouth will be contradicted by some following shit every single time. How people are still taking this weak  fuck serious is beyond me.
Come out of moms basement for some oxygen man.
Dude, your name is Donkey

Actually my name on FB is DonkAy, that's obviously not my real name. And my mother doesn't have a basement but if she did I fail to see the relevance. I'm guessing you're a couple of trump supporters ? Haha
Yup
Im with eminem lol, i bet hes with you too lol. Sold his mom,dad.kid and now himself. Cant stand with someone that weak. Lol smh..
Only a trump supporter would feel comfortable criticizing someones name while also calling themselves Mc Rib...
👏🙌🙌🙌 Yessssss! #fucktrump
Put a pinch in and post another meme man, you're truly a badass...
Ok

Try posting relevant memes though, not the typical bullshit. I'll go ahead and say i dont care for hillary or obama either just to save you some time. I'm not a liberal and I do accept that he is my president. I just don't like who he is.
Donkay Doran says the guy who starts the thread criticizing someone else.  *hey pot, where is the kettle!
I didn't say a damn thing about criticism in general, just pointed out the broken logic in her argument... Is that not obvious? How do you people even dress yourselves ffs
And you can save the ignorant PM's Billy Claggett . just because I think the current president is a joke doesn't mean I don't love this country or belong here.
Your just pissed because your name sucks
I think you mean "you're" as in "you are" but actually I like my name. Its not like I couldn't just change it on fb either way though.  I don't even understand your thought process here.
All this hateful propaganda BS won't help anything. Maybe let's solve problems. Who care if you don't like the way he speaks. I'll guarantee Trump will get another term with all this vitriol.

I have no faith left in humanity either way. People are so broken it hurts my soul. And honestly if it weren't for my personal belief in this country and what it stands for, I'd be more than happy to distance myself from these people.
How many times were you dropped on your head?
Hey well gtfo or go tell Eminem to help fix your situation

Trump is creating jobs and work. Stock market is at a record high. People that have real jobs (not entertainers) are doing much better than under Obama. Obama increased taxes every year on me, I know for a fact because I looked at my pay stubs every year.
You are a fucking fool. Enjoy stupid
Monkey Moron is what they meant to name you
